name: hugo-uswds
description: Hugo theme based on the United States Web Design System

scripts.copy: npm run -s copy:uswds:scss && npm run -s copy:module:scss && npm run -s copy:uswds:js && npm run copy:module:js && npm run -s copy:uswds:img && npm run -s copy:uswds:fonts && npm run -s copy:image-map-resizer:js && npm run -s copy:jquery:js
scripts.copy:uswds:img: npx cpy "uswds/dist/img/**/*.svg" "uswds/dist/img/**/*.png" "uswds/dist/img/**/*.jpg" "uswds/dist/img/**/*.ico" "uswds/dist/img/**/*.gif" dist/img && npx cpy "dist/img/usa-icon/src/img/**/*" dist/img && npx rimraf ./dist/img/usa-icon && npx cpy "dist/img/uswds-core/src/img/**/*" dist/img && npx rimraf ./dist/img/uswds-core
scripts.bundle: npx rimraf ./build _bundles && npx tsc && npx webpack --mode production
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run uswds && npm run bundle && npm run copy

author: David Waltermire <david.waltermire@nist.gov>
